datasets.name: 99313fb4
queryLines:
USE CATALOG `main`;
USE SCHEMA `default`;

SELECT 
  *, 
  CASE 
    WHEN fraud_score >= 70 AND fraud_score < 75 THEN '70-75'
    WHEN fraud_score >= 75 AND fraud_score < 80 THEN '75-80'
    WHEN fraud_score >= 80 AND fraud_score < 85 THEN '80-85'
    WHEN fraud_score >= 85 AND fraud_score < 90 THEN '85-90'
    WHEN fraud_score >= 90 AND fraud_score < 95 THEN '90-95'
    WHEN fraud_score >= 95 THEN '95+'
  END AS fraud_score_category
FROM telecommunications.fraud_data.transaction_risk

datasets.name: 656bb0ef
queryLines:
SELECT 
  assigned_analyst,
  transaction_state AS analyst_state,
  SUM(CASE WHEN review_status = 'reviewed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS reviewed_cases,
  SUM(CASE WHEN review_status = 'escalated' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS escalated_cases,
  SUM(CASE WHEN review_status = 'pending_review' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS pending_cases,
  COUNT(*) AS total_cases
FROM transaction_risk
WHERE fraud_score >= 70 AND fraud_score < 95
GROUP BY assigned_analyst, analyst_state
ORDER BY total_cases DESC

lines:
Risk engine scores each transaction (0–100) from transaction, device, and network data. Score ≥95 → blocked; 70–95 → flagged for analyst review; <70 → passed.

Transaction (e.g. SIM swap, high value, MFA): SIM swap detected (20 pts), high-value device/service purchase (12 pts), recent login failure burst (12 pts).
Device (SDK): VPN active/connected (+6 pts each), unencrypted device (10 pts), emulator / "SDK built for x86" (12 pts).
Network (CDR/cell): Impossible travel (e.g. >250 km/h between cells), cell country ≠ IP country, rapid cell hop (>50 km in <5 min), roaming anomaly (multiple countries in short window).
Auto block engine: if **p(fraud)>95%** -> block transaction

frame.title: $ lost by passing through engine block

lines: BUY: any purchase activity (new phone, service,... ) vs CHANGE: any change activity in account (change name, address, ...)

frame.title: False Positive Cases - review and improve auto block engine (enhance/remove rule)
False Negative Cases - review and improve auto block engine (add rule)
